pkgmetadata.longdescription: Useful Tools for Structural Equation Modeling // Provides miscellaneous tools for structural equation modeling, many of which extend the 'lavaan' package. For example, latent interactions can be estimated using product indicators (Lin et al., 2010, doi:10.1080/10705511.2010.488999) and simple effects probed; analytical power analyses can be conducted (Jak et al., 2021, doi:10.3758/s13428-020-01479-0); and scale reliability can be estimated based on estimated factor-model parameters.
